column5: #### expensive sandwich;http://www.fishingthunderbay.com/cgi...umID16/26.html Another fine example of pure stupidity.
Why even bother trying something like that? Seems to be not worth the hassle or the expense. Very Uncool.

[font color=green size=3][b]This has gone on forever. I remember the slob who was my landlord 30 years ago. He was caught with tropy size Pike with walleye fillets frozen in the body cavity. The resort owner dropped the dime on him,lol.

This technique was news to me, but now that you point it out I imagine people do practice it all the time. I hope the fines are double, 1 fine for violating the game limts, and a 2nd fine for trying to conceal it from customs. IaCraig :D
I am sure its not always Wisconsinites - be kind, we're not all idiots, eventhough these guys are complete d0uchebags.

>I am sure its not always Wisconsinites - be kind, we're not >all idiots, eventhough these guys are complete d0uchebags. Why wou you think we would condem a whole state population for the actions of a few individuals? Most other folks don't put too much importance on which state someone is from.
They've got great Walleye fishing in their home state and they smuggle a few extras across the border? Idiots, morons, embiciles. Serves them right.

Stupidity only begins to describe it. Over the years, there have been many guys I went north with that wanted to bring back scores of filets. I always tell them that it is not worth the trouble and that I wasn't planning to bring any back. From the time we pack the truck until it is unloaded in the driveway, 22 hours or more for us, they are thawed. I would have fresh fillets.
